mapper.select: /* 메뉴 목록 조회 - selectAdminMenuList */ SELECT A.MENU_TYP , A.MENU_NO , A.MENU_KOR_NM , A.MENU_ENG_NM , A.DOC_ID , B.FILE_STOR_PATH , F_GET_CMN_CD_DTL_NM('04', A.CATEGORY) AS CATEGORY FROM T_MENU A , T_ATTC_FILE B WHERE A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N'
/* 메뉴 옵션 목록 조회 - selectOptList */ SELECT MENU_NO , OPT_NO , OPT_NM , OPT_AMT FROM T_MENU_OPT WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
